title: Ralph Northam's Imperfect Blackface Apology Tour | Phoebe Robinson
itunes:title: Ralph Northam's Imperfect Blackface Apology Tour | Phoebe Robinson
description:
V.A. Gov. Ralph Northam discusses his blackface scandal, presidential hopeful Amy Klobuchar's anger comes into question, and actor Phoebe Robinson stops by.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com
